project_metadata.name: MediVision AI
project_metadata.aesthetic: High-Contrast Black & White, Clinical, Precision, Cinematic

rules: NO GRADIENTS in backgrounds. Pure, flat, deep blacks.
Use 1px borders with low opacity (10-20%) for structure.
Primary action buttons should be White with Black text (High Contrast).
Alert colors (Red/Blue) should be used ONLY for status indicators, never for decoration.
Headings: Uppercase, tracking-widest, font-light or bold (extremes only).
Body: Clean, high legibility, relaxed line-height.
Data/Metrics: Monospace font for all numbers and technical data.
Dashboard: Dense data grid, but with 'breathing room' gaps (gap-4 or gap-6).
Upload Zone: Central, dominant, cinematic focus.

inputs.style: bg-transparent border-b border-white/20 focus:border-white outline-none rounded-none px-0 py-2

styles: Scanning Effect: A white line moving vertically across images (simulating a scan).
Staggered Reveal: Dashboard cards fade in one by one.
Hover Invert: Interactive elements invert colors on hover.
Text Reveal: 'Typewriter' or 'Decode' effect for AI diagnosis text.
animations.instructions: Use GSAP for all complex animations. React Spring/Framer Motion can be used for simple layout transitions if needed, but GSAP is preferred for the 'medical scan' feel.

assets.icons: Lucide React (preferred) or Phosphor Icons (for more technical feel)

developer_credits.text: Developed by SAISAKTHI, Prasunambika, Mohammad Basit Wani

pages.landing: Minimalist, Hero section with a 'scanning' animation over a medical image. Strong value prop.
pages.dashboard: Sidebar navigation (collapsed by default on mobile). Main area: Upload zone (top), Recent Scans (grid), AI Analysis Results (right panel).
pages.analysis_view: Split screen: Original Image (left) vs AI Annotated Image (right). 'Doctor View' (technical terms) vs 'Patient View' (simplified language) toggle.

universal_guidelines: Avoid 'AI Slop': No generic gradients, no rounded corners everywhere.
Dark Mode Default: The app should be permanently in Dark Mode (Noir).
Accessibility: Ensure high contrast text (White on Black).
Micro-interactions: Every button, link, and card must have a hover state.
Data-TestID: All interactive elements must have data-testid attributes.
